document_data.caption: A map showing the Suj-lan on Suj.
document_data.name: Suj-lan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Suj-lan''' was small bay located on the southern coast of the island of [[Suj]] on the [[Trackless Sea]].
document_data.Geography: The Suj-lan was located near the center of Suj's southern coast. The city of [[Sujjar]] was located along the Suj-lan.
